text: Empa Marena a mahana-tumelo har’a batho ba habo a re: “Ha ho seo re se bonang ho uena haese motho ea ts’oanang le rona, e bile ha re bone ope ea u setseng morao haese bafutsana har’a rona, ba shebelang litaba bophoqong. Etsoe ha ho bohlokoa boo re bo bonang ho lona bo ka holim’a rona – che, re nahana hore le mashano
